title: Investors Pour Another $4 Billion Into US High-Grade Bond Funds
description: US bond investors poured another $4.3 billion of cash into high-grade bond funds in the week ended Wednesday, the eleventh consecutive week of inflows, according to LSEG Lipper, as investors scramble to buy debt still offering decent yields.
content: US bond investors poured another $4.3 billion of cash into high-grade bond funds in the week ended Wednesday, the eleventh consecutive week of inflows, according to LSEG Lipper, as investors scramble to buy debt still offering decent yields.
